entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Snow and local blowing snow beginning late this evening. Amount 5 cm except 10 cm near the river. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow mixed with rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow becoming mixed with periods of rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low zero.
